sub_title: Owner at Mindiola's Engineering Consultancy Services
summary:
Mechanical Engineer at Zulia State University (1982), Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering. Master Of Science of Engineering @ Louisiana Tech University USA (1999).  Experience of 37 years in the Oil and Gas Industry, Compression Plants, Chemical/Refinery plant, Flow stations, Water injection plants, Oil production facilities, Petrochemical, Power Generation plant @ PDVSA Venezuela and as independent Consultant
Experience of 31 years in design, selection, FAT, SAT, Test procedures, commissioning, startup, O&M of Dynamic Equipment (Rotating and Reciprocating) @ PDVSA Venezuela. 
Experience of 3 years in the Purchasing Area at PDVSA Services in The Netherlands as Technical Manager and later as General Manager
Experience of 3 years as independent consultant
 
Background includes but not limited to:

Predictive Maintenance, rotating equipment, vibration analysis – ADRE – SPECTRUM – CEPSTRUM, Reciprocating analysis – WINDROCK RECITRAP, field balance, alignment, diagnostics, condition monitoring, troubleshooting, root cause failure analysis, Life Cycle Cost, Obsolescence, Lubrication Systems, Fuel System and auxiliaries.

Turbomachinery Repair Shop of Dynamics Equipment, Steam and Gas Turbines (Industrial and Aero derivative), Natural Gas Compressors (Centrifugal, screw, reciprocating, rotary sliding vanes), Turbo-panders, Pumps, Blowers, Fans, Shaft Bearing and Seals, Gear boxes, Vapor Recovery Units (VRU), Coatings, Welding and heat treatment for Gas turbine combustors and hot section. Shaft and components recovery by welding, thermal spray and Selective Plating – SELECTRON

Plant Operation and Maintenance in land and offshore. Major plants turndown planning and execution.

Re-staging and revamping of existing machinery

Performance and roto-dynamic of turbomachinery

Dynamic Equipment Factory (FAT) and Site (SAT) Acceptance Test, procedures and execution.

ASME Membership No. 7121387 since 2001.

For more details,  please check the attached document.
